name: GyroCube VR
description: 2x2x2, 3x3x3, 4x4x4, and 5x5x5 Cube Puzzle Time Attack.Track your personal stats, in order to see how much you're improving as you return to the different modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: SteamVR Compatible HMD + Controllers
